TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant 's former husband lodged an action against the applicant for distribution of matrimonial property .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found that GPE had violated the applicant 's right to a hearing within a reasonable time . It awarded the applicant the equivalent of CARDINAL euros ( at that time ) as just satisfaction in respect of non - pecuniary damage , ordered ORG to proceed and to reimburse the applicant 's legal costs .
CARDINAL . On DATE it rejected the applicant 's fresh complaint about the length of these proceedings as being manifestly ill - founded .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG delivered a judgment in the case . The applicant appealed and the proceedings are still pending .
